N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7070.1 - Policy

State Regulations

In cooperation with the appropriate school district, each
local correctional facility shall provide all eligible youth the opportunity to
participate in educational services pursuant to section
3202
(7)
of the Education Law. Eligible youth are
entitled to receive such educational services and shall be encouraged to become
involved in an educational program provided by the school district so that they
may obtain those skills and credentials necessary to function more productively
both during incarceration and after release. Notes
